verses.content: Chun, Peter le Johanin mihai kuomah thu an hril leiin, thiempuhai, biekin hotuhai, Saddu- kaihai chu an kuom an hung tlung phut a.
Mi an inchûktir le Isu leiin mithi laia inthawka thonâwk thu an hril leiin an lungninaw bêk bêk a.
Chun, an man a, zântieng a ni leiin a zîng chena dingin intângna inah an khum tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, thu ngaihai a ṭhen tamtakin an awi a; an tam tieng chu patling ruok khawm sâng nga lai an tling a.
Chun, a zînga chun an hotuhai, upahai, Dân inchûktirtuhai, Jeru- salemah an um khâwm a,
Thiempu Laltak Anna hai, Kaia- pha hai, Johan hai, Alexandra hai, Thiempu Laltak chihai po po le chun.
Chun, Peter le Johan chu a laiah an inngîrtir a, “Ieng thuneinain am, tu hmingin am hieng hi in thaw a?” an ta, an indawn a.
Chuongchun, Peter chu Thlarau Inthiengin a sip a, an kuomah, “Mi po po hotuhai, upahai,
mi hrâtnaw sukṭhat thuah, ‘Hi mipa hi ieng leiin am a hung dam tah a?’ tiin vawisûn hin in mi fie a ni chun,

nangni po poin hre ro, Israel mi po khawmin hre raw se, Nazareth Isu Krista krawsa in hemde Pathienin mithi laia inthawka a ikeitho nâwk kha, ama hming ngeiin hi mipa hi hitaka hin in hmaah damin a ngîr tah a ni hi.
Nangni in bâwltuhai, in lung dehâwn, a kia lung ṭhangkaitak lo ni ta kha ama hi a nih.
Mi dang tu kuoma khawm san- damna a um nawh; vânkhuphnuoia mihriem isak lai, a mi sandam ding hming dang hrim a um nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Peter le Johan huoizie chu an hmu chun lekha thiemnaw le mi narân el an nih ti an hrietin, mak an ti hleh a; Isu kuomah an um tah ti an hriet tah a.
Chun, mi an sukdam chu an kâwla ngîr an hmuh a, iengkhawm an sawisêl thei si nawh.
Chuongchun, an rorêlnaa in- thawk a an infetir hnungin an inrawn a,
“Hieng mihai hi iengtin am thâwng ei ta? Thilmak inthangtak an thaw ti Jerusalema um po poin an hriet ta hi; eini khawmin ei sêl thei si nawh a.
Nisienlakhawm, mi kuoma ân phuong nâwk zuol nawna dingin, tuta inthawk tû kuoma khawm hi hminga thu an hril nawna dingin vau ei tiu,” an ta.
Chuongchun, anni chu an ko a, Isu hminga thu hril dêr lo ding an ti tlat a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peter le Johan- in an kuomah, “Pathien mithmuin, Pathien thu zâwm nêkin nangni thu zâwm ân dik lem am chu, ngaituo ro.
Keini chu thil kan hmu le kan hriethai kha hril loin kan um thei nawh,” an ta.
Chun, anni chun an vau nâwk zuol a, an insuo tah a. Mipui leiin hremna remchâng an hmu nawh; an thilthaw lei khan mi po poin Pathien an chawimawi sih a.
Thilmaka an isukdam chu kum sâwmli nêk hmana ta m lem a ni sih a.
Chun, Peter le Johan chu an suok chun anni pâwlhai lai an va feh a; thiempu lalhai le upahaiin an kuoma an hril po chu an hril vawng a.
Chuongchun, a ngaihai chun a ruolin rawl inringtakin Pathien kuomah, “Lalpa, nang hnuoi hai, vân hai, tuisuoriet hai, a sûnga um po pohai siemtu i nih;
nangin Thlarau Inthiengin, kan thlatu i siehlaw David bauin, hieng thu hi i hril a nih:- ‘Jentailhai iengdinga an lunginsen am? Hnam tinin iengdinga thil teplo an ngaituo am a na?
Khawvêl lalhaiin an ep huoi huoi a, Hotuhai khawm an pung khâwm a, Lalpa le a Krista chunga chun,’ tiin.
“Hi khuoa hin i siehlaw in- thieng, i hriek nâl, Isu chunga khan Herod le Pontia Pilat le, Jentailhai le Israel mihai an pungkhâwm tak zet a nih;
i kut le i lungrilin tlung dinga i ruot lâwk taphawt kha thaw dingin.
Chuongchun, tuhin Lalpa, an mi vauzie hi ngai ta; i suokhai hi huoitakin i thu inhriltir la,
mihai sukdam dingin i kut phar bawk rawh; i siehlaw inthieng Isu hmingin inchikna le thilmakhai inthawtir bawk rawh,” an ta.
Chun, an ṭawngṭai zo chun an umna in chu a hung inhnîng a, an rêngin Thlarau Inthiengin an hung sip a, huoitakin Pathien thu an hril tah a.
Chun, a ringtu mipuihai chu lungril hmunkhat le ngaituo hmun- khatin an um a; anni laia pakhat khawmin an sum nei, “Ka ta bîk a nih,” an ti nawh; thil po po an inṭâwm lem hlak.
Chun, tirkohai chun awium- takin Lal Isu thonâwk thu an inhriettir hlak a, an rênga chungah lunginsietna nasatak a um.
Chun, anni lai khawm tlasam tukhawm an um nawh, hnuoihai, inhai nei taphawtin an zawr a, an thil zawrhai chu a man an hung chawi a,
tirkohai ke bulah an sie hlak a; an mamaw dai tâwk sengin an sem seng hlak.
Chun, Josef, tirkohaiin Barna- ba an ti chu, (chu hming umzie chu “Thlamuongna nau,” tina a nih), Levi chi, Kupra thlierkâra mi a na,
a lo nei chu zawrin a man a hung chawi a, tirkohai ke bulah a sie tah a.
